entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tier0 castclass pattern allocates #90965
    9.0.0
  • ComWrappers.GetOrCreateObjectForComInstance becomes expensive during the Get cached RCW scenario when called from multiple threads #90964
    9.0.0
  • Internal CLR error (0x80131506) when running IBC collection #90962
  • NativeAOT: ILLink substitutions are evaluated multiple times #90958
  • Regression: Mono Android amd64: condition `class1 != ARG_CLASS_NO_CLASS' not met #90955
  • Known issue: NuGet "FatalProtocolException : Unable to load the service index" #90951
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.SEHException blocking runtime-coreclr superpmi-collect pipeline #90947
  • System.Memory.Tests.Span.StringSearchValuesTests failing with "Exit code was 1 but it should have been 42" #90945
  • JIT assert "(structBaseType != TYP_STRUCT) && (genTypeSize(structBaseType) >= originalSize)" failing in superpmi-collect #90944
    8.0.0
  • Inconsistent Exceptions for ReadOnlyMemory.Slice #90939
  • dotnet dump no longer working on OSX #90938
    9.0.0
  • [Feature Request]Allow MetricEventSource to expose the set of metrics configured by the app #90923
    9.0.0
  • [GeneratedComInterface] in RCW-only mode produces CA2256 warning #90922
  • ObjectDisposedException intermittently crashes test process from DefaultHttpClientFactory.ExpiryTimer_Tick #90919
    8.0.0
  • Regressions from "Add a head merging transformation" #90929
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Sort #90933
    8.0.0
  • Regressions from "Remove AO from CastHelpers.LdelemaRef/StelemRef" #90931
    8.0.0
  • AspNetCore.App runtime 6.0.21 uninstalls version 6.0.20 #90914
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator uses highest installed .NET Runtime, generates C# code incompatible with the SDK of the referencing project #90913
  • Config binder generator generates uncompilable code when a private nested type is used #90909
    8.0.0
  • Config binder generator doesn't generate code when named arguments are out of order #90908
    8.0.0
  • DateTime.TryParse allocates on some failure paths #90907
    9.0.0

Closed

  • System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch When measuring small time periods #90788
    9.0.0
  • ConfigureHttpClientDefaults isn't an extension method in the reference assembly #90911
    8.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism.cmd #86887
    8.0.0
  • Call stack is not as expected if a method is called at last line in caller #90921
  • BDN randomly crashes on Linux? #90691
    8.0.0
  • Improve debugging of HttpRequestOptions #90082
    9.0.0
  • AddMetrics can initialize MetricsSubscriptionManager multiple times #90779
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Functional.Tests timeout in CI #90874
    9.0.0
  • [Question] Ref reassignment #90925
  • ResolvePackageFileConflicts Prohibits using DbgShim from NuGet package #90187
  • Android: new cil-strip feature causes app crashes #88538
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\superpmi\\superpmicollect\\superpmicollect.cmd #90711
    8.0.0
  • Incomplete type errors in lldb/gdb when when using clang-13 or newer #90791
    9.0.0
  • TarFile.ExtractToDirectory is unable to extract tar archives with hard links. #87463
    Future
  • Slow startup on Linux #79206
    Future
  • Too much Gen0 memory usage on Region GC #82416
    Future
  • Blazor unhandled error bar appears when testing various mobile sizes from Chromium mobile simulators #84172
    8.0.0
  • The size calculated to be negative and cause Access Violation when doing vxsort vectorized_partition #86548
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix JIT_ByRefWriteBarrier unwinding on macOS x64 #90967
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Bring AggressiveOptimization back on AwaitUnsafeOnCompleted #90966
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • [release/8.0] Fix Type.ContainsGenericParameters for function pointers #90963
    area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm] Perf pipeline - use `stable` version of `v8` #90961
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Perf optimized find last non-zero element #90960
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [Docs][tests] Add Mono Profiled AOT Functional Test and doc #90959
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix UseManagedNtlm linker Substitutions #90957
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Add telemetry for AndroidStripILAfterAOT #90956
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • Disable RemoteExecutor SearchValues tests on LinuxBionic #90954
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Delete duplicate init-distro-rid.sh #90952
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Add telemetry for AndroidStripILAfterAOT #90950
    area-Build-mono
  • SendRecv_Stream_TCP: also timeout send/receive, escape xunit sync context #90949
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/8.0] [NativeAOT] Missing memory fence before bulk move of objects #90941
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix stack_limit handling #90937
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Support assignment to multiple refs in trim analyzer #90936
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NativeAOT] Fix `--make-repro-path` ILC option #90935
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Only initialize listeners once #90932
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: Fix recording/replay of getExactClasses #90926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Remove dbgshim from platform manifest #90924
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Initialize module's image ALC for dynamic objects #90912
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Regression test for issue #86993 #90906
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Add CFG build for EventPipe enabled #90948
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Slightly reduce the Depth3Test that often times out on Linux #90777
    test-failure, os-linux, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Error out when NativeLib has EventPipe enabled #90934
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Treat *.lss files as plain text in .gitattributes #90940
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix calling existing ctor with MethodInvoker; share tests with invokers #90796
    area-System.Reflection
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #90833
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Update Microsoft.Extensions.Http.cs #90920
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Update Fedora docker image to Fedora 38 #90930
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Make DacValidateMD and DacValidateMethodTable more resilient #90794
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Missing memory fence before bulk move of objects #90890
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reduce startup overhead from jiterp thread safety #90928
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Improve debugging of HttpRequestOptions #90487
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Only initialize listeners once #90902
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • [release/8.0] Fix queue count in rate limiters #90878
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add chrome versions to PR title, and labels #90889
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests build #90927
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove dbgshim from platform manifest #90193
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update Microsoft.Extensions.Http.cs #90916
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary "return 100"s from tests #89550
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix SPMI issue in getHelperFtn #90888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update (remove most) most of CLRTestKind, GenerateRunScript, RestorePackages #89696
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Clean up AggressiveOpt tier in vm #90504
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr
  • Add boolean field to indicate whether or not the Windows thread pool is being used #90551
    area-System.Threading
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add New Test to Monitor Number of Jitted Methods #90681
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • `PEImage` should not expose ref to `m_path` field #90753
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #89311
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Upgrade wasm helix VMs to ubuntu 22.04 #90881
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix a deadlock in NonGC + Profiler API #90847
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Adding missing System.Buffers documentation #90891
    needs-area-label
  • [browser] Update browser template to use Wasm SDK #90871
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add check that tests are public #89554
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump main version to 9.0-alpha1 #90558
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Expose extension points needed by UnityLinker. #90688
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [RISC-V] Fix tmpReg in emitInsTernary #90770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Case: The method has not been jitted yet #90821
  • [wasm] Add a dependency on dotnet/installer to get the latest #90904
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Upgrade our TFM to net9.0 #90880
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0-staging][wasm] runtime: Fix creating the stack trace for a ManagedError #89905
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Build native windows-arm64 Mono cross-compilers #89651
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call JIT icall to handle static virtual methods #90875
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Mask all shift amounts #90666
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Enable rule CA1869 - Cache and reuse 'JsonSerializerOptions' #90895
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Making mono_inst_name less misleading #83570
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [mono][jit] Don't truncate the high bits when ldelema index is nint #88986
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [RISC-V] Initial commit for libraries directory #90203
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label, 9.0.0
  • Mono - CordbProcess::GetThread implementation #90733
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix invalid PGO optimization path on Nuget cache containing spaces. #90729
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add tests for `GetInterfaceMap` on static interface methods #90518
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable use-after-return checking in ASAN #89204
    area-Infrastructure
